Constructor Detail

AbstractGraphicsOP

public AbstractGraphicsOP()
Constructor used by subclasses to create an instance of the AbstractGraphicsOP class to preform graphic drawing operations.

AbstractGraphicsOP

public AbstractGraphicsOP(javax.swing.JComponent comp)
Constructor used by subclasses to createn an instance of the AbstractGrapchicsOP class, initialized with the JComponent object used during callbacks, to perform graphic drawing operations. Callbacks on the JComponent object are invoked to acquire information about the component (such as size) in order to carry out the drawing operation.
Parameters:
comp:Ljavax.swing.JComponent - object used for callbacks.
Method Detail

getComponent

public javax.swing.JComponent getComponent()
getComponent returns the JComponent object for which graphic drawing operations are rendered and callbacks are invoked.
Returns:
the Ljavax.swing.JComponent object for this GraphicsOPIF objecct.

getViewableArea

public java.awt.Dimension getViewableArea()
getViewableArea returns the area of the JComponent object valid for rendering the graphics operation. Note that the Insets object for the JComponent object account for the UI of the JComponent.
Returns:
a Ljava.awt.Dimension object specifying the viewable painting area.

paintOP

public void paintOP(java.awt.Graphics g)
paintOP should be called by the JComponent object in it's paint method to perform the graphics operation defined by this GraphicsOPIF object.
Specified by:
paintOP in interface GraphicsOPIF
Parameters:
g:Ljava.awt.Graphics - object used to draw/render the graphic defined by this GraphicsOPIF object.

public void setCallback(javax.swing.JComponent comp)
setCallback sets the JComponent parameter to be the object used during callback and graphics operations.
